document.full_text: three months before representative anthony weiner sent a photo from his twitter account to a 21-year-old washington state woman, a small group of self-described conservatives were warning young women on twitter to be wary of him.
document.title: a twitter group warned about weiner
lines_and_colors: three months before representative anthony weiner sent a photo from his twitter account to a 21-year-old washington state woman, a small group of self-described conservatives were warning young women on twitter to be wary of him.
